alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 7:53AM AKST until February 23 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow amounts of 1 to 3 inches. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Petersburg and Wrangell. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult. Heavy snow could be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall rates expected through Wednesday morning. Lighter amounts are expected in Kake. A report of 4 inches of snow near Petersburg was made earlier this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island
